alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Hooker; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Hooker, southwestern Brown, northwestern Logan, eastern McPherson, northwestern Blaine and Thomas Counties through 100 AM CDT/MIDNIGHT MDT/... At 1215 AM CDT/1115 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles northeast of Hershey to 6 miles north of Ringgold to 7 miles northwest of Tryon. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thedford, Tryon, Halsey, Purdum, Ringgold, Norway, Koshopah, Hawley Flats, Natwick and Shimmons Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 198 and 233. Highway 92 between mile markers 197 and 222. Highway 97 between mile markers 23 and 48. Highway 83 between mile markers 120 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
